entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 10:11 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with periods of snow near midnight and ending overnight then cloudy. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
